abstract: The retailer said it was investigating a report that customer credit and debit card data was stolen from its systems and put up for sale online.
snippet: The retailer said it was investigating a report that customer credit and debit card data was stolen from its systems and put up for sale online.
lead_paragraph: Home Depot said on Tuesday that it was investigating a report that customer credit and debit card data was stolen from its systems and put up for sale online.

headline.main: Home Depot Investigates a Possible Credit Card Breach
headline.print_headline: Home Depot Investigates a Possible Data Breach
